runs.comm: good length outside off stump, Gambhir defends on the front foot towards cover
short of a length down leg side, Gambhir whips the ball off his hips, he's hit it in the air, flat and fast over the leaping David Warner at short fine leg
full and far outside off stump, that's a wide
good length and straight this time, defended from the crease on the off side
good length at brisk pace outside off stump, Gambhir tries to cover drive but gets beaten, Wade appeals for a caught behind
full ball outside off, Gambhir square drives behind point for a single
Sehwag tries to drive his first ball through cover but it was a bit too full for the back-foot drive, he gets beaten outside off
good length and straight from over the wicket, Gambhir defends on the back foot
length delivery angling across the left-hander, Gambhir tries to steer towards third man but is beaten
Gambhir backs away and tries to blast the good length ball through the off side, he doesn't make contact
short of a length close to off stump, cut off the back foot to the fielder at point
short of a length down leg side, Wade tumbles to his right to collect
there's some width outside off and Gambhir dabs the ball wide of the slip cordon and places it fine enough to beat third man
good length delivery pitching around off and angling away from Gambhir, who lets it go
too full and too straight, Sehwag helps himself to a boundary with an easy flick off the pads through backward square leg
defended off the back foot on the off side, the length was good and the line off stump
Sehwag moves back and works the ball off his hips in front of square leg
Gambhir stays in his crease and opens the face to steer a length ball behind point
Sehwag waits in his crease and drives a slightly slower delivery between cover and mid-off
Gambhir defends a good length ball from his crease, Lee runs across to prevent the batsmen stealing a run
good length outside off stump, Sehwag pushes towards cover point and sets off for a very quick single
a slower ball on the pads, Gambhir plays it through square leg
short of a length outside off, not much room there but Sehwag cuts it fine, between the seagull at gully and the fielder at slip
Sehwag jumps back and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
Gambhir punches the length ball fluently towards cover point
a slower ball short of a length on the hips, Gambhir works it off his body towards square leg
short of a length just outside off, Gambhir opens the face as the ball climbs, steering it behind point, Sehwag calls him through for a single
that's a quick and well-directed bouncer, very straight, Sehwag ducks under it, turning his head away from the ball
good length and straight, Sehwag punches back to the bowler
Sehwag tries to drive through the off side but gets a thick outside edge, the seagull has moved out of gully so there's nothing in the way as the ball goes towards third man
Gambhir plays a loose waft off the back foot at a good length delivery that speeds past his off stump and is beaten
dabbed off the back foot with an open face, the ball beats the fielder at backward point
full ball on the pads, played towards short fine leg
Sehwag has charged Doherty and slammed him high and far over the straight boundary, his first ball against the spinner and that's 15 rows back at least. It's been caught in the stands, top effort.
Sehwag attacks Doherty again and hits him uppishly through square leg, shouts of catch but it was wide of the fielder
played off the pads behind square
Sehwag comes out of his crease and drives a quicker and fuller ball past the bowler
Gambhir steps out this time and drives the ball to long-on
nudged off the pads on the front foot on the leg side
Sehwag cleared his front foot to make room but then played the googly back to the bowler

would you believe it, Sehwag has hit a full toss straight to extra cover. Sehwag came down the track, drove hard at the full toss outside off stump and ensured the fielder did not have to move. A lucky break for Australia
Kohli goes back and defends
width outside off stump and Kohli plays a flashy cut, along the ground to the fielder at deep point
driven to long off for a single
Kohli moves back and cuts the ball hard in front of cover point
left alone outside off stump
played to midwicket for a single
that's too wide outside off stump
Kohli goes back and cuts the ball late in front of the fielder at backward point, India reach 50
Gambhir goes deep into his crease and cuts the ball late through backward point, Kohli runs hard and pushes Gambhir for the third
driven to long off for a single
Kohli reaches out for a delivery that floats across him and gets an outside edge past the keeper to the third man boundary, that was the googly from the chinaman
shorter length and Kohli goes back and pulls to the deep square leg boundary
Gambhir steps out, gets to the pitch of the ball and chips it over the infield to the extra cover boundary
played wide of the fielder at cover for a single
Kohli dabs the ball towards point and runs
flatter ball on the pads, played towards square leg

a slower ball on a good length, Gambhir drops it at his feet and looks up to see Kohli charging through for a single, Marsh sprints, dives and attempts to parry the ball on to the stumps, Kohli dives and makes it, Marsh misses. It's all happening.
defended from the crease towards cover
short ball and Kohli pulls the ball towards deep midwicket, Gambhir runs hard for the second and beats Brett Lee's throw
Kohli was on the front foot to a good length ball and was beaten as he tried to defend
played towards long on for a single
short of a length and slower, Gambhir gets on top of the bounce and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
Gambhir uses the angle into him to work the ball towards short fine leg
driven to long on for one more
quicker ball hits Gambhir on the pads as he tries to play on the leg side, that was missing leg
Gambir chips the ball over the infield at cover once again
Gambhir pushes forward and closes the face to play the ball towards square leg
once again Gambhir goes inside out, chipping the ball over cover into the open spaces in the deep, he's not hitting hard, just placing well
hit hard off the back foot towards extra cover where Bailey makes a five save
full and straight, Kohli drives to long off
cuts off the back foot towards the fielder in the deep
that's short and Kohli goes right back and pulls the ball powerfully along the ground to the midwicket boundary
another short ball but this time Kohli mis-times the pull slightly, hitting it through square leg
Gambhir goes back and dabs to backward point for a single
good length and straight, Gambhir moves his foot forward and taps the ball in front of square leg, Lee prevents the second by running in quickly from the deep
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli moves towards it and cuts in front of point
dabbed off the front foot close on the leg side, Gambhir begins to run and then stops because McKay has moved quickly to field the ball
Gambhir tries to close the face and play the ball on the leg side, he gets a leading edge through cover
Kohli's lucky there! He tried to pull a ball that wasn't too short from outside off and got a top edge that flew high over slip to the third-man boundary
nudged from the crease on the leg side
Kohli taps the ball towards wide mid-on and they run two because the fielder from the deep has to cover lots of ground
played off the pads towards fine leg
Gambhir drops the ball with soft hands close on the off side and they run a single
edged and caught! Kohli was on the front foot, pushing away from his body at a good length ball that bounced a bit more, he got a thick edge and Wade dived to his right to hold a sharp catch
short of a length and straight, Dhoni jumps back and plays the ball towards square leg with legs splayed
full and straight from Marsh, Gambhir glances the ball towards fine leg
full toss outside off, this time it isn't caught at extra cover. Gambhir drives it in front of point
Dhoni goes back and pushes a googly towards cover, not sure if he read that
shorter length, gives Dhoni lots of time to go back and nudge the ball off his pads behind square
another googly which beats Gambhir's attempt to work the ball behind square
shorter length this time so Gambhir can move back and tap through square leg
that's not pretty, Hogg dropped it short but the ball bounced a bit more, Dhoni tried to play a paddle of sorts behind square but ended up hitting the ball on to his boot and towards the off side
length ball on the off side, driven towards extra cover for a single
short ball down leg side, Dhoni swivels and tries to pull but can't make contact

that was quick! Dhoni hared down the pitch after pushing towards cover, beating the throw at the bowler's end, which missed the stumps. Brett Lee fumbled while backing up and the batsmen took advantage
short ball outside off stump, Dhoni carves it with plenty of bottom hand, lurching back and jumping as he made contact, sending the ball racing to the backward point boundary
played off the pads through square
a short ball that rises sharply on Gambhir, he fends awkwardly on the leg side instead of swaying and letting it go
dabbed off the back foot towards third man
another short ball at Gambhir, who rides the bounce and opens the face to play towards third man
full and straight, Dhoni hammers the ball along the ground back at the bowler, the ball crashes into Lee's boot and he winces in pain
short of a length at the body, Gambhir drops the ball close on the leg side and runs, Lee ambles across to pick it up

Dhoni moves towards the off and pulls a short of a length delivery towards long leg, McKay runs to his right on the boundary and slides, he gets a hand on the ball but it trickles past him to the boundary
Dhoni swivels and pulls once again to McKay on the fine leg boundary
short of a length and straight, Gambhir stays in his crease and defends towards point
short ball and Dhoni pulls it hard towards the fielder on the midwicket boundary
short of a length outside off, with only 11 to get off 17 balls, Gambhir can afford the luxury of letting it go
Gambhir gets to his fifty by dabbing a full toss off his pads behind square, and then running for the overthrow. He's steered this chase rather well
Dhoni's played a tennis shot of sorts, clubbing the ball with the bottom of the bat towards deep midwicket, not very aesthetic
worked off the pads through square leg
length ball outside off, Dhoni steers it through point and retains strike with three to get
Dhoni stays in his crease and plays to midwicket
driven hard but to the fielder at cover
worked off the pads behind square
Gambhir gets an outside edge as he dabs towards third man to bring the scores level
nudged off the pads to square leg
pushed off the front foot to cover
length ball outside off stump, cut off the back foot to point. Five balls to go ...
good length once again, Gambhir pulls but can't beat midwicket ...
that's too full outside off to try and cut and Gambhir gets beaten on the back foot, three to go ... Dhoni goes up to have a chat

this time he finds the gap, with a drive from the crease between midwicket and mid-on, India have won their first game on this tour of Australia. This tour, although terrible, will not be described as 'winless' as India's tour of England is.
